2017: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
2018: Activate to deal 75 damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

2046: ❢ Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.75, up to 75.  ❢ Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.
2047: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 100% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.
2048: After moving unmounted, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 30% more damage to Heroes.
2049: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
2050: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes Slowed by Plasma Cutter Slow all enemies in the area by 35% for 4 seconds.
2052: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 30% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
2053: Plasma Cutter deals 50% more damage to Slowed targets.
2054: After arriving with Warp, gain 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode.
2055: Activate to instantly drain Shield Capacitor's Shield, but increase Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds proportionate to the amount of Shields drained, up to an 80% increase.
2056: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
2057: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 105 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.
2058: After arriving with Warp, gain 40 Armor for 4 seconds.
2059: Fenix gains 15 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
2060: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 20% of the healing received.
2061: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 10% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 20%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 20% of the damage dealt.
2062: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.
2063: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
2064: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
2065: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
2066: Repeater Cannon grants 50% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1 more range.
2067: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 600 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

ClutchHealer: Healed When Ally Was At Critical Health
MostDaredevilEscapes: Escaped death in teamfights multiple times
